    • 方法详细资料

      • fetchWorkingKey

        public WorkingKey fetchWorkingKey(java.lang.String gpeId)
                           throws ApplicationException
        Fetch working key according to the GPE and current date, if no, generate it. DataKey is a 3DES secret key, which size is 24 bytes, and will be converted into base64 string. Also MACKey is HMacMd5 secret key, which size is 24 bytes, and will be converted into base64 string. NOTE: must announced this service as synchronized, otherwise may generate multiple GPE keys for single GPE client of same day due to un-repeated read.
        指定者:
        fetchWorkingKey 在接口中 WorkingKeyService
        参数:
        gpeId - gpeId The id of GPE. TE will exchange working key with this GPE.
        抛出:
        ApplicationException
        另请参阅:
        WorkingKeyService.fetchWorkingKey(String)

      • getGpe

        public Gpe getGpe(java.lang.String id)
           throws ApplicationException
        从接口复制的说明: WorkingKeyService
        Find Gpe by id.
        指定者:
